list","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false},"canChangeWriters":{"description":"Slugs of services/users who can change the writers checksum (e.g., of services/users who can delete the secret","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false},"encrypted":{"description":"Whether the secret is encrypted\nAll secrets are encrypted before written to the DB.\nThis really only exists for write requests to know if the secret is already encrypted.\nIe: while most `secret save [key] [value]` commands are probably not encrypted,\nFile based saves, eg. `secret save secretA.yaml` are probably encrypted.","type":"boolean"},"id":{"description":"Id of the secret","type":"string"},"key":{"description":"Envar or slug-like key of the secret","type":"string"},"readers":{"description":"Slugs of services/users who can read the secret","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false},"value":{"description":"Secret secret","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false}},"type":"object","title":"secret_svc.Secret"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false}},"type":"object","title":"secret_svc.ListSecretsResponse"}}},"description":"List
